headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Data files. Only supports CSV and TXT files. The file suffixes should exactly be .csv or .txt .

parameters.name: file_signature
parameters.description: The file's MD5, which is used for server-side verification.

parameters.name: calculate_type
parameters.description: Encryption type. The value for this field must be consistent with the actual file data. Otherwise, your upload will fail or you will not be able to create a valid audience. For enum values, see Enumeration - Encryption Type .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: file_path
fields.description: Unique path to the file in the repository. Note : Only the same advertiser ID that was used to upload the audience file can later use the returned file_path to create the audience.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
